events.text: ... and that's what the situation looks as of now.
This truly is a unique case. I've never seen a case of the immune system eating itself away like this before, but it doesn't look terminal like what your doctors have said.

[Scientist], that's why I've come to you about this. No one else knows of my condition, not even my family. I need you to figure some way to cure this curse. I can't afford [Daughter] growing up without a father.

Well [Player], you've come to the right place. While those doctors are puzzled about your condition, I’m no ordinary scientist and this is no ordinary lab. I think I can figure out a cure, but there is one issue.
I simply don't have enough time, not before your body consumes itself first.
Don't look so glum. We still might have a way.
Now don't get too hopeful just yet. This is a major gamble, one that involves putting my own tail on the line.
Please tell me, [Scientist]. I'll do whatever I can to make this happen.

Well, I am still indebted to you for that time you saved my tail. You see this machine here? It's a prototype of a time machine, a culmination of all current underground research on time travel, one that can reset everything back to a certain point in the past, except for those in the capsule.

Those in the capsule will physically reset to that point of time, but their mind will not. As such, we will reset time as much as we need so I can figure out a cure while we keep your body from destroying itself.

Your body only has about [color=#73bed3]two days[/color] left before you’re beyond the point of saving. I’ll need at least [yellow]four days[/color] before I can engineer a fix to your special case of sepsis.
Is this safe? What about the research on the cure that you worked on?
Well, we don't have a choice. This is our only option for me to have enough time to figure out a cure. As for the research, I'll bring it with me in the capsule and it'll go back in time with me.
I'll do it. [shake rate=4 level=5]Whatever it takes.[/shake]

Good. Come back tomorrow. I need to get this machine up and running first. Consider taking a vacation from that stressful government intelligence job until this gets resolved. I'll see you then, [Player].
